about_the_game:
BodyRecords

Offers a distinctive fusion of bodycam perspective, eerie liminal spaces, and immersive microphone sensitivity - be cautious, your voice can give you away.

Set within expansive, atmospheric environments, players must explore, solve puzzles, and evade dangers while gathering vital information to escape.

In BodyRecords, teamwork is crucial. Players must collaborate closely to solve puzzles and progress.

Key Features:

  • Bodycam Perspective: Experience immersive gameplay through a bodycam view that’s central to the action.

  • Microphone Sensitivity: Your voice and sound affect the game, adding tension and immersion. Be careful - the creepy creatures around you react to any noise.

  • Puzzle-Solving: Dive into intuitive yet engaging puzzles that enrich the exploration.

  • True Cooperative Play: Meaningful teamwork is required to progress, making collaboration essential for survival.

Explore, solve, escape - work together to uncover the local mysteries.

So are you ready to capture your journey?

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD equivalent or greater

  • OS: Windows 10

short_description: BodyRecords is a chilling horror experience, blending bodycam immersion,microphone sensitivity to your voice, and eerie spaces. Work together with teammates to solve puzzles, evade lurking horrors, and escape. True cooperative play and unsettling atmosphere make every moment a tense challenge.
